text: Catherine Fournier (born 7 April 1992) is a Canadian politician. She was mayor of Longueuil on November 7, 2021. She is the third female mayor in the city's history. She was previously member of the National Assembly of Quebec, elected on December 5, 2016."PQ wins two of four by-elections; status quo remains". CTV Montreal, December 5, 2016. Fournier was the youngest member of the National Assembly, and the youngest woman ever elected to that body. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian mayors Category:Politicians from Quebec
title: Catherine Fournier
